00109 INT frontend_init() {
00110 
00111   INT   status;
00112   BOOL  default_justfilled = FALSE; // Assuming the worst
00113   DWORD default_lastfilled = 0;     // Assuming the worst
00114   DWORD default_timelimit  = 28000; // 8 hours between fills
00115   // Get handles to database keys if they exist,
00116   // and create otherwise with default worst-case-scenario values
00117   status = cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00118   if (status != CM_SUCCESS) {
00119     printf("Warning: Could not connect to ODB database!\n");
00120     return FE_ERR_HW;
00121   }
00122 
00123   status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, sLastFilled, &kLastFilled);
00124   if (status == DB_NO_KEY) {
00125     db_create_key(hDB, 0, sLastFilled, TID_DWORD);
00126     db_find_key(hDB, 0, sLastFilled, &kLastFilled);
00127     status = db_set_value(hDB, 0, sLastFilled, &default_lastfilled, sizeof(default_lastfilled), 1, TID_DWORD);
00128   }
00129   if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00130     printf("Warning: Could not access key %s!\n", sLastFilled);
00131     return FE_ERR_HW;
00132   }
00133 
00134   status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, sJustFilled, &kJustFilled);
00135   if (status == DB_NO_KEY) {
00136     db_create_key(hDB, 0, sJustFilled, TID_BOOL);
00137     db_find_key(hDB, 0, sJustFilled, &kJustFilled);
00138     status = db_set_value(hDB, 0, sJustFilled, &default_justfilled, sizeof(default_justfilled), 1, TID_BOOL);
00139   }
00140   if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00141     printf("Warning: Could not access key %s!\n", sJustFilled);
00142     return FE_ERR_HW;
00143   }
00144 
00145   status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, sTimeLimit, &kTimeLimit);
00146   if (status == DB_NO_KEY) {
00147     db_create_key(hDB, 0, sTimeLimit, TID_DWORD);
00148     db_find_key(hDB, 0, sTimeLimit, &kTimeLimit);
00149     status = db_set_value(hDB, 0, sTimeLimit, &default_timelimit, sizeof(default_timelimit), 1, TID_DWORD);
00150   }
00151   if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00152     printf("Warning: Could not access key %s!\n", sTimeLimit);
00153     return FE_ERR_HW;
00154   }
00155 
00156   /*
00157   // Check if alarm exists and, if not,create it
00158   // Copied from midas.c which should take care of this, but doesn't
00159   char str[256];
00160   sprintf(str, "/Alarms/Alarms/%s", sAlarmName);
00161   db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &kAlarm);
00162   if (!kAlarm) {
00163   ALARM_ODB_STR(alarm_odb_str); // The initial "run number too large" settings for a default alarm
00164   status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, str, strcomb(alarm_odb_str));
00165     db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &kAlarm);
00166     if (!kAlarm) {
00167       cm_msg(MERROR, "ge_ln2_init", "Cannot create alarm record");
00168       return FE_ERR_HW;
00169     }
00170     BOOL al_active    = TRUE;                        // Alarm should be on
00171     INT  al_type      = AT_EVALUATED;                // Alarm type is evaluated; it looks for a certain ODB value to be too large
00172     char al_cond[256] = "";                          // Not a "conditional" alarm in the MIDAS sense
00173     char al_class[32] = "Alarm";                     // When triggered, the alarm will have black letters on red background
00174     char al_msg[80]   = "Germanium must be filled!"; // Message on banner
00175     db_set_value(hDB, kAlarm, "Active",        &al_active, sizeof(al_active), 1, TID_BOOL);
00176     db_set_value(hDB, kAlarm, "Type",          &al_type,   sizeof(al_type),   1, TID_INT);
00177     db_set_value(hDB, kAlarm, "Condition",      al_cond,   sizeof(al_cond),   1, TID_STRING);
00178     db_set_value(hDB, kAlarm, "Alarm Class",    al_class,  sizeof(al_class),  1, TID_STRING);
00179     db_set_value(hDB, kAlarm, "Alarm Message",  al_msg,    sizeof(al_msg),    1, TID_STRING);
00180     
00181   }
00182   */
00183   return CM_SUCCESS;
00184 }

00229 
00230 INT ge_ln2_read(char *pevent, INT off) {
00231 
00232   static INT    status, size;
00233   static DWORD  lastfilled, now, timelimit;
00234   static BOOL   justfilled;
00235   static DWORD  *timesincefill;
00236 
00237   bk_init(pevent);
00238   timesincefill = NULL;
00239 
00240   // Get recent values
00241   size = sizeof(lastfilled);
00242   status = db_get_value(hDB, 0, sLastFilled, &lastfilled, &size, TID_DWORD, FALSE);
00243   if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00244     cm_msg(MERROR, "ge_ln2_read", "Error getting last filled time");
00245     return 0;
00246   }
00247 
00248   size = sizeof(justfilled);
00249   status = db_get_value(hDB, 0, sJustFilled, &justfilled, &size, TID_BOOL, FALSE);
00250   if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00251     cm_msg(MERROR, "ge_ln2_read", "Error getting just filled status");
00252     return 0;
00253   }
00254 
00255   size = sizeof(timelimit);
00256   status = db_get_value(hDB, 0, sTimeLimit, &timelimit, &size, TID_DWORD, FALSE);
00257   if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00258     cm_msg(MERROR, "ge_ln2_read", "Error getting time limit between fills");
00259     return 0;
00260   }
00261 
00262   // If just filled, write time to ODB
00263   if (justfilled == TRUE) {
00264     lastfilled = (DWORD)time(NULL);
00265     status = db_set_value(hDB, 0, sLastFilled, &lastfilled, sizeof(lastfilled), 1, TID_DWORD);
00266     if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00267       cm_msg(MERROR, "gn_ln2_read", "Error setting last filled time");
00268       return 0;
00269     }
00270     justfilled = FALSE;
00271     status = db_set_value(hDB, 0, sJustFilled, &justfilled, sizeof(justfilled), 1, TID_BOOL);
00272     if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00273       cm_msg(MERROR, "gn_ln2_read", "Error setting just filled status");
00274       return 0;
00275     }
00276 
00277     al_reset_alarm(sAlarmName);
00278 
00279     bk_create(pevent, "LN2F", TID_DWORD, &timesincefill);
00280     *timesincefill = 0;
00281     bk_close(pevent, ++timesincefill);
00282 
00283     return bk_size(pevent);
00284   }
00285 
00286   // Check the status
00287   bk_create(pevent, "LN2F", TID_DWORD, &timesincefill);
00288   now = (DWORD) time(NULL);
00289   *timesincefill = now - lastfilled;
00290   if (*timesincefill > timelimit) {
00291     al_trigger_alarm(sAlarmName, "Germanium must be filled!", "Alarm", "", AT_INTERNAL);
00292     printf("Alarm!\n");
00293   }
00294   bk_close(pevent, ++timesincefill);
00295 
00296   return bk_size(pevent);
00297 }
